陶片放逐法（ostracism），是雅典等古希腊城邦的一种特殊的古代民主政治. 陶片是指选票,它是按公民投票来决定是否对一公民...)会 …
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... ostracise 排斥；放逐 ostracism 贝壳流放,放逐,排斥 ostracize 放逐，排斥.
在公元前五世纪末期的八十年代还实行了“陶片放逐制”(ostracism), 即雅典公民如果认为某个人危害了城邦的安全和稳定，可以在公民 …

list.abs: 职场排斥(英文：Workplace ostracism) 是指员工在职场中知觉到的来自他人的排挤或忽视对待。 职场排斥的内涵 (1) 职场排斥是一种 …
GlobalShar... ... 社交绩效 social performance 职场放逐 workplace ostracism 被迫式公民行为 compulsory citizenship behavior.
借助政府掌管的力量和社会排斥 （social ostracism） 2 ，社会批准财产权持有者选择的用途。如果资源归政府所有，决定其用途的 …
这些制裁范围从社会流放或排斥(Social Ostracism)到暴行，而且能有效地将「古怪」举止带到执勤线上。这是同侪团体秘密或掩饰 …
ostraceous的用法例句1. ostraceous psoriasis 蛎壳状牛皮癣2. ostraceous 蛎壳形的
North Korea pledged to scrap its nuclear arms programme in return for aid and an end to its international ostracism in a deal signed in 2005 .北韩在2005年签订了一份协议，发誓要取消他的核武器计划以换取援助，结束对其的国际孤立。

entry.def: Ostracism is the state of being ostracized or the act of ostracizing someone.

example.ex: ...those who have decided to risk social ostracism and stay on the wrong side of town.
example.tran: 那些决定冒着遭受社会孤立之险、继续呆在贫民区的人

example.ex: ...denunciation, tougher sanctions and ostracism from the civilised world.
example.tran: 来自文明世界的谴责、更加严厉的制裁和排斥

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being banished or ostracized (excluded from society by general consent);

sentences.sentence: "the association should get rid of its elderly members--not by euthanasia, of course, but by Coventry"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of excluding someone from society by general consent

auth_sentence.content: If I offend...the community will punish me with ostracism.
auth_sentence.res_content: If I offend...the community will punish me with ostracism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I offend...the community will punish me with ostracism.

auth_sentence.content: His review of the literature on ostracism is another must read.
auth_sentence.res_content: His review of the literature on ostracism is another must read.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His review of the literature on ostracism is another must read.

auth_sentence.content: Any disagreement invites not debate, but ostracism for the dissentient.
auth_sentence.res_content: Any disagreement invites not debate, but ostracism for the dissentient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Any disagreement invites not debate, but ostracism for the dissentient.

sentences.en: There is yet some good in public envy, whereas in private, there is none. For public envy, is as an ostracism, that eclipseth men, when they grow too great. And therefore it is a bridle also to great ones, to keep them within bounds.
sentences.cn: 虽说私人间的嫉妒有百害而无一利，但公众的嫉妒却还有一点好处，因为它就像陶片放逐法，可除去那些位高专权者，所以它对其他大人物亦是一种制约，可使他们循规蹈矩。
